idea:
When I was a university student, I struggled with writing notes in one place and accessing them digitally. While tablets exist, these are very expensive and I would often use mine just for writing and nothing else.
I want to introduce a very basic tablet simply just for writing digital notes. This could be used for recording lecture materials, discussions, or equations in labs. This would be different from others as it would have little other functionality than to transfer your notes written with the stylus to your laptop, where you can organise them in your folders.
The display is very minimalistic with few colour options and the notes can be transferred by bluetooth or a desktop app. The reason I propose this is to make something affordable for students that will get its full use. There is no need to feel you have wasted hundreds of pounds on an expensive tablet just for writing, when you can spend much less to get something designed for writing.
